name: jellyseerr
description: Seerr is a fork of Overseerr, a self-hosted service for managing media requests in Plex, Sonarr, and Radarr setups. It offers user roles, search, and approval workflows.
features: Media requests: Users can search and request movies or TV shows for download.
Plex integration: Syncs with Plex libraries to show available content and prevent duplicates.
Radarr connection: Automatically sends movie requests to Radarr for downloading.
Sonarr connection: Routes TV show requests to Sonarr with season and episode selection.
User management: Create accounts with different permission levels and request quotas.
Approval workflows: Require admin approval for requests before sending to download clients.
Notification system: Sends alerts via email, Discord, Slack, or Telegram for request updates.
Discovery features: Browse trending, popular, and upcoming content for easy requesting.
Request tracking: Monitor request status from submission through download to availability.
Quality profiles: Users can select preferred quality settings for their requests.
Multi-language support: Interface available in multiple languages for international users.
Mobile responsive: Fully functional on mobile devices for requesting content on the go.
